title: Addressing the Child and Adolescent Mental Health Gap After the Pandemic: Why Translational, Practice-Oriented Research Matters.
abstract: The global disruption caused by COVID-19 has drawn renewed attention to an already pressing reality: child and adolescent mental health requires sustained, system-level investment and high-quality evidence to guide practice [...].
clean_text: addressing the child and adolescent mental health gap after the pandemic why translational practice oriented research matters the global disruption caused by covid has drawn renewed attention to an already pressing reality child and adolescent mental health requires sustained system level investment and high quality evidence to guide practice
